info.description: API Service for a Mock Online Shop
info.title: Mock Shop API

parameters.description: Pagination: amount of items per page
parameters.name: pageSize

get.description: Get all products in a category.

parameters.description: Pagination: amount of items per page
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: Pagination: amount of items per page
parameters.name: pageSize

post.description: Confirm the specified email when creating a user account and add a password for the account. If the request is successful, the user account is created and the user can log into it.

Recovery password. If the request is successful, the service sends an e-mail to the account email address with an email confirmation token as a URL param "confToken". For example: https://client.com/password-recovery?confToken=eyJhbGciOiJIU1iIR5csdDIkwErXVCJ9. This token is required to set a new password.

put.description: Set new password. If the request is successful, the account password is changed for the specified new password.

post.description: Log into an existing user account. If the request is successful, the service returns an authorization token.

Create a user account. With this account the user can place orders. If the request is successful, the service sends an e-mail to the specified email address with an email confirmation token as a URL param "confToken". For example: https://store.com/confirm-email?confToken=eyJhbGciOiJIU1iIR5csdDIkwErXVCJ9. This token is required to confirm specified user email.

parameters.description: Pagination: amount of items per page
parameters.name: pageSize

post.description: Create a new order. If the request is successful, a new order is added to the user's list of orders and the stock of products in the catalog is updated.
